oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bessie Smith and the Lafayette Players
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Metal photoplates; Smith, Bessie, 1894-1937;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Test prints of metal photoplates prepared for Bessie Smith and the Lafayette Players. Both prints were marked "DES" to indicate that the metal photoplates were destroyed during World War II.
